```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(scales)
library(xtable)
library(broom)
```
# load data
```{r}
dDeltaE = read_csv('./deltaE/sorted-deltaE-CIE2000-block1.csv') 
dEntropy = read_csv('./entropy/sorted-entropies-all-block1.csv') 

# combine into one dataframe
d <- merge(dDeltaE, dEntropy) %>%
  rename(deltaE = "Delta-E-CIE-2000", entropy = block1)

```
# plot entropy vs. delta E 
```{r}
ggplot(d, aes(x=entropy, y=deltaE, label=word)) +
  geom_text(check_overlap = TRUE, size=3)
```
# compute correlation between entropy and delta E
```{r}
cor.test(d$entropy, d$deltaE)
```
